transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

scriptLines: DateSource derive(year_week = concatWS('-', substring(toString(year_week),1,4), substring(toString(year_week),5))) ~> DerivingYearWeekColumn

transformations.name: CastWeeklyIndicatorValue
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: CastDailyIndicatorValue
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

scriptLines: SelectNeededColumn split(indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator=='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
PivotIndicatorWeekly derive(weekly_count_of_ICU_admission = toInteger(byName('count of Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k')),
weekly_count_of_hospital_admission = toInteger(byName('count of Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k')),
PivotIndicatorDaily derive(daily_count_of_ICU_admission = toInteger(byName('count of Daily ICU occupancy')),
daily_count_of_hospital_admission = toInteger(byName('count of Daily hospital occupancy')),

source.name: count of Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k
count of Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k
